newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil shares close off after wage increase ruling.
newsitem.headline: Brazil shares close off after wage increase ruling.

text.p: Helped by a drop in the Dow, Brazil stocks fell for a second day in a row amid worries over a high court ruling granting a wage hike that may cost billions of dollars to the federal government, brokers said.
The Bovespa index of the 49 most traded shares closed off 0.79 percent at 87,018 points. Market volume was a high 796.6 million reais ($758.6 million).
"The selling pressure eased today but concerns over the court ruling continued to affect trading," a senior trader said.
